definition: ruthless and lacking in conscience/vicious mind full of hatred and jealousy/black core (flaw in pottery)
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
contaminated food product unscrupulously marketed as wholesome

sentences.english: Those greedy bosses shut their ears to appeals from workers.
sentences.chinese: 那些黑心的老板从不听工人的呼吁。

sentences.english: But they're often falling into the hands of unscrupulous labor brokers.
sentences.chinese: 但他们往往落入黑心的劳工中介手中。

sentences.english: The view that all wealthy people are evil will result in hatred for wealth.
sentences.chinese: 有钱人都是黑心肠的观点，会导致仇富心理的产生。

sentences.english: He is a black hearted guy.
Some medicine salesmen earn ill-gotten money against their conscience.
sentences.chinese: 一些医药代理人赚的都是黑心钱。

sentences.english: At least you didn't buy a "dirty" TV or air conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 至少你没买到黑心电视或黑心冷气。

sentences.english: At least you didn't buy a "dirty" TV or air conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 至少你没买到黑心电视或黑心冷气。

sentences.english: Eurasian herb cultivated for its dark- centered deep red flowers.
sentences.chinese: 因其黑心的暗红色花朵而培育的欧亚草本植物。

sentences.english: This ruthless attorney embezzled millions from clients. embezzle.
sentences.chinese: 这个黑心律师贪污了顾客数百万。

sentences.english: The happiness of the evil-minded is black.
The greedy shop keeper often cheats customers by selling fake goods.
sentences.chinese: 这个黑心的老板经常出售假冒伪劣商品欺骗客户。

sentences.english: Black-hearted boss, ah, the machine tune too dead, two extensions can be input into this.
sentences.chinese: 老板黑心啊，机子调得太死了，两分机都能输成这样。

definition: to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
to be lacking in moral sense/to lack common basic respect for others/lacking in virtue/mischievous/wicked/cruel/mean

pinyin: chi1 ren2 bu4 tu3 gu3 tou2
